1.title: Gray, "I'll Never Wonder Why Spike Has Bad Breath Again"
1.author: Gray-Fields-Blyberg.
notes: Summary: Stu Pickles experiences a can of dog food as he's feeding Spike.

2.title: Gray, "Let's Play with my New Cynthia Dream Surgery Kit"
2.author: Gray & Baker.
notes: Summary: Susie's mom runs of to teach surgery, taking the toy medical instruments by mistake.

3.title: Gray, "Liontamer"
3.author: Gray & Ruler.
notes: Summary: Spike is not quite ferocious enough for a good circus lion fantasy.

4.title: Gray, "Playing Blocks"
4.author: Gray & Baker.
notes: Summary: Susie's brother Edwin is smart, and Tommy decides not to compete when he sees Edwin's double helix construction.

5.title: Gray, "She Doesn't Give Shots, I Promise!"
5.author: Gray-Baker.
notes: Summary: Tommy finds out that Susie's mom is a doctor, and he hides.

6.title: Gray, "Stu's Really in the Doghouse"
6.author: Gray & Fields.
notes: Summary: Tommy checks but only Spike's in the doghouse.

7.title: Gray, "Whatever It Is, It Sure Makes Him Happy"
7.author: Gray & Fields.
notes: Summary: Spike is woofing in his sleep.
